description:
I believe the phrase for this is.. ‘Mercia? 🙅‍♀️🤬
A bit of context, I recommend further research: This woman was found to have a very serious mental illness. My reason for sharing it despite that knowledge is simply this- had she been a woman of color I think despite the revelation of her illness, it would have been much worse for her. .
.
.
.
